mapper.select: select * from timetable where id = #{id} and semester = #{selc}
select * from (select item_no from timetable where id = #{id} order by item_no desc) where rownum = 1
mapper.insert: insert into timetable(item_no, id, semester, subject, day, start_time, start_minute, end_time, end_minute) values(#{itemNo}, #{id}, #{semester}, #{subject}, #{day}, #{start_time}, #{start_minute}, #{end_time}, #{end_minute})
mapper.delete: delete from timetable where id = #{id} and item_no = #{itemNo}
